Subject: Supervision for the upgrade to 5.9.4.1. for the Production Environment
Description:
Hi Team,

Booking.com team is planning to upgrade the EPP server (production) to 5.9.4.1.
Can you please advise on the availability to supervise the upgrade and make the nginx/ database checks once the upgrade is completed? Booking.com team would like to have this performed tomorrow 11th February during the afternoon (CET: Amsterdam time).

Thank you,

Oana Nemes | Team Lead, Customer Success
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
What_We_Know__c: Customer would like to update the EPP Server to 5941
Next_Steps__c:
A remote session will be scheduled for tomorrow/day after tomorrow

The update was applied correctly. Waiting for the customer to run some tests during the next days and confirm if everything works as expected
Solution_Comment__c: The server was updated, no issues were encountered.
